template:docs/atoms/au-badge.title: Badge
template:docs/atoms/au-badge.text: Badge Options Skins Sizes Properties @skin: [ none | border | brand | success | warning | error | action ] - default is gray @size: [ small ] - makes badge smaller @icon: Find the options here @number: [1 - 100]

template:docs/atoms/au-brand.title: Brand
template:docs/atoms/au-brand.text: Brand Logo Logo with link Logo with tagline Properties @tagline: [ string ] - adds a tagline underneath the logotype @brandLink: [ url ] - adds a link.

template:docs/atoms/au-button.title: Button
template:docs/atoms/au-button.text: Button Primary button Indicates the main action of the view (only one should be used per view). Primary button Primary button - large Primary button - icon Primary button - icon Primary button - icon Primary button - block Primary button - error Primary button - loading Primary button - disabled Secondary button Addon to a primary action (should not be used without the presence of a primary button). Secondary button Secondary button - large Secondary button - icon Secondary button - icon Secondary button - icon Secondary button - block Secondary button - error Secondary button - loading Secondary button - disabled Tertiary button Can be used as a standalone secondary action or link. Tertiary button Tertiary button - icon Tertiary button - icon Tertiary button - icon Tertiary button - block Tertiary button - error Tertiary button - loading Link button - disabled Properties @skin: [ secondary | tertiary ] - default is primary @size: [ large ] - makes a button larger @icon: [ icon name ] - adds an icon @iconAlignment: [ left | right ] - adds margin left or right of the icon @hideText: [ true ] - hides the button text visually @width: [ block ] - makes a button behave like a block element @alert: [ true ] - adds an alert state to the button @disabled: [ true ] - adds a disabled state to the button @loading: [ true ] - adds a loading state to the button Button Group Groups and spaces buttons Primary button in group Secondary button in group Large primary button in group Large secondary button in group Button Group Inline Can be used as a toggle function. Not functional in this demo. Primary button in group Primary button in group - active Large primary button in group Large primary button in group - active Secondary button in group Secondary button in group - active Large secondary button in group Large secondary button in group - active Tertiary button in group Tertiary button in group - active

template:docs/atoms/au-heading.title: Heading
template:docs/atoms/au-heading.text: Heading Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Properties @level: [ 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 | 6 ] - changes the depth of the heading (h1 > h6) - default is 1 (h1) @skin: [ 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 | 6 ] - changes the style and size of the heading - default is 1

template:docs/atoms/au-hr.title: Horizontal Ruler
template:docs/atoms/au-hr.text: Horizontal Ruler Horizontal Ruler Ruler with normal margins Ruler with large margins Ruler with huge margins Horizontal Ruler Properties @size: [ large | huge ]

template:docs/atoms/au-icon.title: Icon
template:docs/atoms/au-icon.text: Icon Usage Add your icons to the public/icons folder as .svg. Make sure to export your svg's without fill or stroke colors so we can style these with CSS. Adding icons The appuniversum-symbolset is generated by svg-symbols. Run npm run icons to generate or update the symbolset. Properties @icon: pass the svg name to select the icon @size: [ medium | large ] @alignment: add [ left | right ] margin to the icon - default is none @ariaHidden: [ true | false ] - default is true Included icons add alert-triangle archive arrow-down arrow-left arrow-right arrow-up attachment bin bold calendar check cross document documents download draft export github hierarchal-back indent italic info-circle link login logout manual message nav-down nav-left nav-right nav-up nav-up-down ordered-list pencil plus-text question-circle redo renew reverse-indent search search-folder settings sitemap strikethrough switch upload underlined unordered-list user user-fill user-popup users

template:docs/atoms/au-input.title: Input
template:docs/atoms/au-input.text: Input Normal input Normal input Block input Block input with icon (default | left aligned) Block input with icon (right aligned) Input Required Input required Verplicht Error Input Normal input Something is wrong. Input Properties @error: [ true ] - add an error state @width: [ block ] - display the input as a block element @icon: [ icon name ] - adds an icon (using an icon implies the use @width="block") @iconAlignment: [ left | right ] - adds margin left or right of the icon (default is left) Label Properties @error: [ true ] - add an error state Helptext Properties @error: [ true ] - add an error state

template:docs/atoms/au-link.title: Link
template:docs/atoms/au-link.text: Link Primary link Primary link Primary link + icon Primary link - active Secondary link Secondary link Secondary link + icon Secondary link - active Properties @skin: [ secondary ] - default is primary @active: [ true ] - adds an active state and disables pointer events @linkRoute: the route that is passed to the link @icon: [ icon name ] - adds an icon @iconAlignment: [ left | right ] - adds margin left or right of the icon @hideText: [ true ] - hides the button text visually

template:docs/atoms/au-navigation-link.title: Navigation link
template:docs/atoms/au-navigation-link.text: Navigation link Navigation link Navigation link active Properties @linkRoute: the route that is passed to the navigation item

template:docs/atoms/au-pill.title: Pill
template:docs/atoms/au-pill.text: Pill Pill Pill - border Pill - action Pill - success Pill - warning Pill - error Pill - error + icon Properties @skin: [ none | border | action | success | warning | error ] - default is grey

template:docs/atoms/au-textarea.title: Textarea
template:docs/atoms/au-textarea.text: Textarea Normal Textarea Normal textarea Block textarea Textarea Required Textarea required Verplicht Error Textarea Normal textarea Something is wrong. Properties @error: [ true ] - add an error state @width: [ block ] - display the input as a block element

template:docs/components/au-card.title: Card
template:docs/components/au-card.text: Card Card – normal – centered – flexed with badge Title for card Subtitle for card Information in the card that comes below the header. Content. Ga naar toezicht Title for card Subtitle for card Information in the card that comes below the header. Content. Ga naar toezicht Title for card Subtitle for card Information in the card that comes below the header. Content. Ga naar toezicht Card – with badges, small or big, icon or number Title for card Subtitle for card Title for card Subtitle for card Title for card Subtitle for card Title for card Subtitle for card Card - divided Title for card Subtitle for card Information in the card that comes below the header. Content. Card expandable Title for card Subtitle for card Information in the card that comes below the header. Content. Card properties @flex: [ true ] - layout elements as flexbox columns @expandable: [ true ] - card becomes expandable @textCenter: [ true ] - centers text Card header properties @badgeIcon: Find the options here @badgeSkin: [ none | border | brand | success | warning | error | action ] - default is gray @badgeSize: [ small ] - makes badge smaller

template:docs/components/au-data-table.title: Data table (draft)
template:docs/components/au-data-table.text: Data table (draft) Wrapper for https://github.com/mu-semtech/ember-data-table Regular table Notulen zitting Nieuwe zitting Small table Notulen zitting Nieuwe zitting Properties For now, you can only add the class [au-c-data-table__table--small] in the content tag.

template:docs/components/au-dropdown.title: Dropdown
template:docs/components/au-dropdown.text: Dropdown Default Switch profile Logout Left alignment Switch profile Afmelden Right alignment Switch profile Afmelden Properties @dropdownTitle: pass the title of the dropdown @dropdownButtonLabel: pass name of the dropdown button (visually hidden) @alignment: [ left | right ] position the icon and menu - default is centered

template:docs/components/au-modal.title: Modal (draft)
template:docs/components/au-modal.text: Modal (draft) Todo Seperate the open button from the modal component Make the modal open/close action available to other components Modal button styles Modal content Action Modal content Action Modal content Action Fullscreen modal Modal content Action Properties @buttonTitle: [ string ] - set the title of the open modal button @buttonIcon: add an icon to the open modal button (see icon component for available icons) @modalTitle: [ string ] - set the title of the modal @buttonSkin: [ secondary | tertiary ] - default is primary @size: [ fullscreen ] - make the modal open fullscreen

template:docs/components/ember-power-sel.title: Ember power select (draft)
template:docs/components/ember-power-sel.text: Ember power select (draft) Styling of https://ember-power-select.com/ Single select Multiple select

template:docs/patterns/au-body-container.title: Body container (draft)
template:docs/patterns/au-body-container.text: Body container (draft) Body container This block will take up all the vertical space left, but will not be scrollable — even if the content is longer than the vertical space that is left. Body container with scroll This block will take up all the vertical space left, and will be scrollable if the content is longer than that vertical space that is left.

template:docs/patterns/au-content-header.title: Content header
template:docs/patterns/au-content-header.text: Content header Properties @titlePartOne: top part of the title @titlePartTwo: bottom part of the title @pictureSize: [ large ] - creates a full-bleed picture

template:docs/patterns/au-main-container.title: Main container (draft)
template:docs/patterns/au-main-container.text: Main container (draft) Main container Sidebar Main content Main container with scroll Sidebar Main content

template:docs/patterns/au-main-footer.title: Main footer
template:docs/patterns/au-main-footer.text: Main footer Gelinkt-notuleren.lblod.info is een officiële website van de Vlaamse overheid Uitgegeven door Agentschap Binnenlands Bestuur Disclaimer Cookieverklaring

template:docs/patterns/au-main-header.title: Main header
template:docs/patterns/au-main-header.text: Main header Afmelden Properties @brandLink: pass a link to the logo (the logo has no link if this property is not present) @appTitle: pass the header title @homeRoute: pass a route for the appTitle link (expected behaviour is to link to the dashboard or homepage of the application) @contactRoute: pass a route for the contact route (no contact route is shown when this property is not present)

template:docs/patterns/au-toolbar.title: Toolbar
template:docs/patterns/au-toolbar.text: Toolbar Default Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Reverse Primary button Secondary button Border: top Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Border: bottom Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Skin: tint Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Sizes Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Reverse A very long text that is supposed to overflow when nowrap has not been added to the AuToolbar component. A very long text that is supposed to overflow when nowrap has not been added to the AuToolbar component. Button Properties @reverse: [ true ] - reverse the direction of the child components @border: [ top | bottom ] - adds a border a padding to the top|bottom @skin: [ tint ] - adds a background color @size: [ small | medium | large ] - adds more padding @nowrap: [ true ] - aligns elements to the top and makes sure groups, when dealing with longer content, do not push groups into a new line

template:index.text: Ember Appuniversum This is an overview of the ember-appuniversum components. References: Webuniversum V3 LNE webcomponents
